name: First Solar, Inc.
description: First Solar, Inc. is a leading global provider of comprehensive photovoltaic (PV) solar energy solutions. Founded in 1999, the company is headquartered in Tempe, Arizona, and has established itself as a pioneer in the solar industry by focusing on sustainable energy and innovation. First Solar is known for its advanced thin-film solar technology, which offers a lower carbon footprint and greater efficiency compared to traditional silicon-based solar panels. The company designs, manufactures, and sells solar modules and provides utility-scale PV power plants and supporting services. First Solar’s commitment to sustainability extends to its operations, where it emphasizes responsible sourcing and recycling of materials. The company aims to accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy through its innovative technologies and project development capabilities. With a strong portfolio of projects and a growing pipeline, First Solar is positioned to play a key role in the global energy transition, contributing to the fight against climate change while delivering strong financial performance. The company’s mission encompasses both environmental stewardship and economic viability, making it a leader in the renewable energy sector.
